awe6.interfaces.IInputKeyboard

type
interface
The IInputKeyboard interface should be implemented by an object wishing to be used as a virtual keyboard input device.

Instance Methods

getIsKeyDown( type : EKey ) : Bool

parameters
type They key.
returns
Returns true is the key is currently down, false otherwise.
Determine if a specific key is currently down.

getIsKeyPress( type : EKey ) : Bool

parameters
type The key.
returns
Returns true is the key was pressed in the current update, false otherwise.
Determine if a specific key was pressed in the current update frame.

A press is defined as a new down - i.e. was up previous frame, and is down this frame.

getIsKeyRelease( type : EKey ) : Bool

parameters
type The key.
returns
Returns true is the key was released in the current update, false otherwise.
Determine if a specific key was released in the current update.

A release is defined as a new up - i.e. was down previous frame, and is up this frame.

getKey( keyCode : Int ) : EKey

parameters
type The keyCode.
returns
Returns the key of the corresponding keyboard keyCode.
Translate a keyCode to a specific key.

getKeyCode( type : EKey ) : Int

parameters
type The key.
returns
Returns the keyboard keyCode of the corresponding key.
Translate a specific key to a keyboard keyCode.

getKeyDownDuration( type : EKey, ?asTime : Bool, ?isPrevious : Bool ) : Float

parameters
type The key.
?asTime If true then returns duration as milliseconds, else returns duration as frame updates.
?isPrevious If true then returns the previous duration down (the time held prior to the most recent release).
returns
Returns the duration the key has been down.
Determine how long a specific key has been down.

getKeyUpDuration( type : EKey, ?asTime : Bool, ?isPrevious : Bool ) : Float

parameters
type The key.
?asTime If true then returns duration as milliseconds, else returns duration as frame updates.
?isPrevious If true then returns the previous duration up (the time unused prior to the most recent press).
returns
Returns the duration the key has been up.
Determine how long a specific key has been up.
